A

addShip(int, int, char, int, int) - Method in class board.Board
Adds ship board base on its coordinates generated in the ship class.
addShipImage(String, BoardValue[][], int, int, char) - Method in class gui.BoardGUI
Adds a specified ship image to a coordinate in the board display.
addValuesFromArray(Player, String) - Method in class gui.BoardGUI
Reads an array that represents a player's board and creates the visual representation of it.
aiTurnTransition() - Method in class gui.AttackClickHandler
Transition in P-v-AI mode to let the player know that the AI is making a move initiates playerTurn for AI which makes the attack for the AI and updates the boards.
aShipSunken(int, int) - Method in class board.Board
check if a ship has sunken base on the position being attacked
AttackClickHandler - Class in gui
The event handler for the board in the display where players click where they want to attack.
AttackClickHandler(double, Scene, String) - Constructor for class gui.AttackClickHandler
The constructor for this event handler.
AttackPhase - Class in gui
This class creates the user interface of the main game where players take turns to attack each other's ships It's base layout is a BorderPane where only the center, bottom and left regions are used.
AttackPhase(Scene, String, boolean) - Constructor for class gui.AttackPhase
The constructor of the AttackPhase.
